medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment for unique identification of the Credit Advice, the type of Credit Advice and its function.

medi:segment.name: Business function
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BUS, A segment identifying certain characteristics of the Credit Advice, such as its business function. In so doing, it provides information about the message that may be used to route the message within an institution, for tariffing, or for the provision of some statistical information.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date and, when required, the time at which the message has been created as well as other dates and times relevant to the financial transaction.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying a previously sent message.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment specifying the reference of the previously-sent message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the creation date/time of the referenced message.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the monetary amount and, if necessary, the currencies and exchange rate and date for that payment.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment giving the amount value of the credit.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment identifying the source currency and the target currency of the transaction when they are different. The rate of exchange is solely used when previously agreed between the Ordering Customer and the Ordered Bank.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the effective date and/or time the rate of exchange was fixed. The other occurrence identifies the reference date.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying other transactions to which funds associated with the Credit Advice are related, such as a separate foreign exchange deal.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment giving information in coded or clear form, to provide supplementary information relating to the Credit Advice.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments providing information about the financial institutions and accounts of each party to the Credit Advice, together with details of any parties contacted or to be contacted in relation with the transaction, and any required action by parties to the transaction.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment identifying the financial institution (e.g., bank) and relevant account number and currency for the Payor, Payee and other parties to the transaction.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the financial institution specified in the FII segment and to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment providing a communication number for the party identified in the FII segment and optionally for the contact identified in the associated CTA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments identifying the name and address of the non- financial institutions involved in the transaction and their contacts.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the name and address of the non-financial parties associated with the Credit Advice and their functions. Identification of the Payor and Payee parties is mandatory for the Credit Advice message and should be given in this segment.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the NAD segment and to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment providing a communication number for the party identified in the NAD segment and optionally for the contact identified in the associated CTA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments containing instructions relating to parties identified in the NAD and FII segments. It specifies action taken or to be taken by the identified parties, and the date (and optionally time) by which such action was taken or needs to be taken.

medi:segment.name: Parties and instruction
medi:segment.medi:documentation: INP, A segment identifying the party originating the instruction, the parties contacted or to be contacted at or by the associated financial institution on matters concerning the execution of the payment. It specifies where appropriate the instruction in coded form.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment providing free text instruction relating to the associated INP segment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the earliest and the latest dates and times by which the instruction specified in the INP and/or FTX segments needs to be carried out.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments providing information for subsequent use by regulatory authorities requiring statistical and other types of data. It also identifies the regulatory authority for which the information is intended followed by the information itself.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment identifying what processing should be completed by regulatory authorities.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment giving the amount and the currency of each transaction to be reported.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment giving the different origins/destinations (places) of goods/investment/services.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the recipient of the associated informative text.

medi:segment.name: Requirements and conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RCS, A segment giving the nature (e.g. goods, transport services) and direction of each transaction to be recorded in coded form.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment giving information, in coded or clear form, to provide information relevant to regulatory authorities requirements.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments providing full details of all charges, or allowances, and associated taxes, that apply to a particular transaction, together with information as to who bears the charges, and to which account they have been directed. A total value of all charges plus allowances may be given for every account to which charges may be directed. Where charges are subject to taxation this may also be specified.

medi:segment.name: Financial charges allocation
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FCA, A segment specifying the method for allocation of charges and allowances and identifying an account to which such charges or allowances were directed where it is different from the principal account.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment giving the total value of charges and/or allowances and associated taxes, that relate to an account for charges/allowances. This segment also identifies the basis amount from which charges are calculated, if different from the overall amount of the original order.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments providing a detail breakdown of all charges (or allowances) and associated charges (or allowances).

medi:segment.name: Allowance or charge
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALC, A segment providing full details of each charge or allowance for which the Payee is liable. Included are full details of the method of calculating the charge.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying the percentage used for calculating the charges (or allowances).

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying the amount of charges (or allowances) and/or specifying the basis amount from which charges (or allowances) may be calculated if different from the FCA segment.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment used to specify rates related to the charges and allowances.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the effective date and/or time the rate of exchange was fixed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments describing any taxes associated with the charges and their amount.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment identifying any taxes related to a specific charge.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the total amount of the tax and the basis of calculation.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment specifying exchange rates.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the effective date and/or time the rate of exchange was fixed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments providing brief structured cross references to transactions to which the credit advice relates.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment identifying the document relating to the credit advice.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the date of issue of the document described in the preceding DOC segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments specifying the details of authentication.

medi:segment.name: Authentication result
medi:segment.medi:documentation: AUT, A segment specifying the details of any authentication (validation) procedure applied to the Credit Advice message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the date and where necessary, the time of validation.
